title: BIONIC Watch Face
summary: Interactive Watch Face for android wear
description: Model NumberEF-AD45CategoryFuturisticProduct description BIONIC is a Futuristic watch face available for all smart watches, a Interactive Touch makes it magnetic  (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features	Interactive Watch	1.6 million colors Themes	Night Mode	Digital & Analog Dial	Date & Day	12 & 24 hour time format	8 beautiful background patterns	5 Beautiful Default Ambient Modes	Custom Ambient Mode with Unlimited Colors	Default Ambient Mode Pack with Unlimited Colors 	square & round watches supportAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu) Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter ! Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose BIONIC  as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! descriptionHTML:
Model Number
EF-AD45

Category
Futuristic

Product description

BIONIC is a Futuristic watch face available for all smart watches, a Interactive Touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

 Interactive Watch
 1.6 million colors Themes
 Night Mode
 Digital & Analog Dial
 Date & Day
 12 & 24 hour time format
 8 beautiful background patterns
 5 Beautiful Default Ambient Modes
 Custom Ambient Mode with Unlimited Colors
 Default Ambient Mode Pack with Unlimited Colors
 square & round watches support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!

Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293


It has following features

Features:

 Interactive Watch
 1.6 million colors Themes
 Night Mode
 Digital & Analog Dial
 Date & Day
 12 & 24 hour time format
 8 beautiful background patterns
 5 Beautiful Default Ambient Modes
 Custom Ambient Mode with Unlimited Colors
 Default Ambient Mode Pack with Unlimited Colors
 square & round watches support

Configuration:

 Turn On / Off Interactive Touch
 Turn On / Off Night Mode
 Pick Your Favorite Background
 Change Dial Color
 Change Hour Color
 Change Minute Color
 Pick Your Favorite Color Scheme
 Pick Your Favorite Ambient Mode
 Pick Your Favorite Ambient Mode Color
 Switch between 12 hour & 24 hour Format

Interactive Touch:

 Lock / Unlock Interactive Touch
 Turn On / Off Night Mode
 Pick Your Favorite Background
 Change Dial Color
 Change Hour Color
 Change Minute Color
 Pick Your Favorite Color Scheme
 Switch between 12 hour & 24 hour Format


For Email support Contact us at elitewatchface@gmail.com

Tip 1
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose BIONIC as your watch face


Note
Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Love This Amazing Watch This watch Is Really Cool & have unlimited colors combination & backgrounds are awesome , I will recommend It Must Download and get too much customizable watch at cheap price
Square Supposed to Support square watch faces and it shows up  round on my square watch I hate it, refund me. I use Asus  Zen gen.1 watch.
